scripts.build: forge build && rm -rf ./dist/artifacts/*/*.metadata.json && yarn typechain && tsc
scripts.prepublishOnly: rm -rf ./dist && forge clean && mkdir -p ./dist/artifacts && yarn build && cp -R src dist && cp -R addresses dist
scripts.test: echo 'temporarily skipping metadata tests, remove this when fixed' && forge test --no-match-test 'WithAddress' -vvv
scripts.storage-inspect:check: ./script/storage-check.sh check Manager Auction Governor Treasury Token
scripts.storage-inspect:generate: ./script/storage-check.sh generate Manager Auction Governor Treasury Token
